original_text: And he took away the foreign gods and the idol from the house of the Lord, and all the altars that he had built on the mountain of the house of the Lord and in Jerusalem, and he threw them outside of the city.
korean_text: 이방 신들과 여호와의 전의 우상을 제거하며 여호와의 전을 건축한 산에와 예루살렘에 쌓은 모든 제단들을 다 성 밖에 던지고

sentences.original_text: And he took away the foreign gods
and the idol from the house of the Lord
and all the altars that he had built
on the mountain of the house of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 주의 집 산 위에 있던 제단들과

sentences.original_text: and he threw them outside of the city
